ONLINE VOTING

At the end of each meeting, we decide who is voted off the island!

Level-2 Update

31 August 2020

Despite Auckland moving down to level-2, Varsity Toastmasters will continue to meet on Zoom.

The University won't let us back on campus until level-1 because we're "not important enough".

We keep the same Zoom link each week -- Which is right here.
